title: Can AI Lead To Nightmarish Scenarios? Neil Thompson On What Can Go Wrong

title: Why Data Analysis and AI Can’t Be Ignored in This Time and Age - Insights from John Itodo
description: In today’s digital economy, data has become the world’s most valuable resource. From how we shop to how we learn, from how businesses make decisions to how governments design policies—data and the artificial intelligence (AI) systems that interpret it are shaping nearly every aspect of modern life.
